item.title: SmartThings
item.description: The SmartThings Hub acts as the centre of a smart home. Able to connect wirelessly with hundreds of compatible smart devices, allowing monitoring, controlling and securing a home from anywhere. samsung.com SmartThings primary products include a free SmartThings app, a SmartThings Hub, as well as various sensors and smart devices. The SmartThings native mobile application allows users to control, automate, and monitor their home environment via mobile device.
